General.Name: HLT Global Bhd
General.Description: HLT Global Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the design, fabrication, installation, testing, and commissioning of glove-dipping lines in Taiwan, Vietnam, the United States, India, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Japan, Australia, and internationally. It operates through Glove-Dipping Lines and Rubber Gloves segments. The company also provides upgrading and modification works for glove-dipping lines; supplies and trades in associated parts and components; manufactures and trades rubber gloves; and undertakes fabrication works for metal and stainless steel products. It supplies its products to rubber glove manufacturers. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Puchong, Malaysia.
